title: Ethiopia Humanitarian Assistance 2010-11
description: The Ethiopia Humanitarian Assistance 2010-11 provides support to the United Nations Development Programme (UNDP) for the implementation of mine action activities in Tigray, Afar and Somali regions in Ethiopia. The objectives of the project are to: improve food security and socio-economic development in-country; enhance the peace and stabilization process in Tigray, Afar, and Somali regions; assist Ethiopia to fulfil its commitment under the Anti-Personnel Mine Ban Convention (APMBC); and increase in access to, and improved safety in, land in mine-affected areas with a special focus on Somali, Tigray, and Afar regions. The total value of this initiative is $1.0 million to be expensed during the 2010-11 financial year.
